=== Accessibility Team ===

We are always looking for new team members for the accessibility team.

Ways to get involved:

* Help with <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility/Testing|testing]]</nowiki> 
* Help with <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility/Testing|bug triage and tagging]]</nowiki>
* Write new and update old <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Accessibility/doc|documentation]]</nowiki>, including the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility/Personas|Personas Project]]</nowiki> 
* Help get the word out about Ubuntu accessibility and the accessibility team 
* Work on accessibility development. Development specific discussions should take place on the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-accessibility-devel | developers mailing list]]</nowiki>
* Check out our <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility/Team/TODO|TODO page]]</nowiki>
* Have other ideas of what you'd like to do to help? <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Accessibility/Contacts|Come find us]]</nowiki>!

We welcome you to join in and make Ubuntu available for all users.
